events.message: I was involved in a car accident last night when another vehicle collided with me unexpectedly at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision incident reported.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will assist further with documentation and process.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged, and we have started tracking the vehicle damage details and accident report.
Please submit all relevant documents including the police report, photos of the car damage, and your driverâ€™s license for claim processing.
We have received all requested documents related to the car accident and are now reviewing them to proceed with the investigation.
Our claims investigation team has started evaluating the circumstances and damage from the reported auto collision incident.
The investigation into the car accident and vehicle damages has been completed. Findings have been documented for settlement review.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the investigation results covering repairs to your vehicle after the accident.
We received your feedback regarding the settlement proposal and your concerns about the compensation amount offered.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the compensation package finalized to cover your vehicle repairs.
The payment for the approved claim has been issued and should reflect in your account within the next two business days.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful payment and completion of all related procedures.
